sourcesContent:
<ion-header> <ion-toolbar> <ion-title>modifier un Médicament</ion-title> </ion-toolbar> 
<ion-button (click)="close()">fermer</ion-button>
</ion-header>
<ion-content [fullscreen]="true">

<form> <ion-item> <ion-label position="floating">Nom du Médicament</ion-label> <ion-input [(ngModel)]="medicament.nom" name="nom" type="text" required [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-input> </ion-item>

<ion-item>
  <ion-label position="floating">Dosage</ion-label>
  <ion-input [(ngModel)]="medicament.dosage" name="dosage" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}" type="number" required></ion-input>
</ion-item>

<ion-item>
  <ion-label>Fréquence</ion-label>
  <ion-checkbox [(ngModel)]="medicament.prises[0].checked" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-checkbox>
  <ion-label>Matin</ion-label>
  <ion-checkbox [(ngModel)]="medicament.prises[1].checked" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-checkbox>
  <ion-label>Midi</ion-label>
  <ion-checkbox [(ngModel)]="medicament.prises[2].checked" [ngModelOptions]="{standalone: true}"></ion-checkbox>
  <ion-label>Soir</ion-label>
</ion-item>

<ion-button type="submit" expand="full" (click)="modifierMedicament()" >modifier</ion-button>
<ion-button type="submit" expand="full" (click)="supprimerMedicament()">supprimer</ion-button>
</form> </ion-content>
